How will you ensure that the data are securely stored and not accessed or modified by unauthorized persons? 
The shared server is only accessible to lab members and the hard drives only to people with badge access and knowledge of the
location. Sensitive data will be stored on an encrypted hard drive.

Low, already covered by lab funding.
